author: Staff Reporter
text:
The burnt body of an unidentified woman was found on the roadside at Kunnam near Vanur on Saturday. Locals noticed the body and alerted the police. Police sources said the body was burnt beyond recognition. They suspect that the woman, aged about 20 years, might have been murdered and burnt with petrol.

Police stations in Villupuram and Puducherry have been alerted. A list of missing women is being prepared in the area for further analysis. Further investigation is on.
